attributes.review: This app is unbearable. It is so racist having sayings as “all lives matter” like sis, read the room it’s black lives matter honey. Let’s not be racist now trump, how dare you say all lives matter when black lives need to be helped. Innocent black people are being killed everywhere with almost no news sources talking about it. So if all lives matter why don’t we help black lives HUH. Anyway, the manny will not be televised and sign some petitions plsss, thanks.
attributes.title: You’ll get cursed if you download this app🥳

attributes.review: I love my president so much but this app is NOT HIS! It is made by China to hack and steal our Great American Information😡🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷Donald needs to make this app an illegal! I downloaded it and it asked me for so many things that i know those communists sold to their terrible government! My phone was glitching and my facebook would NOT work- that’s where they went first to poison me with 5G! 😷I quickly deleted and now my phone and facebook are back working so i can keep supporting our wonderful president! MAGA 2020 🇲🇾!!!!!
attributes.title: Sad!

attributes.review:
I downloaded the app earlier today and as soon as I opened it, my battery dropped down and a notification popped up saying that the trump 2020 app was selling my information to China!!   I can’t believe this is still allowed on the App Store because it’s just awful for consumers. The UI is horrible and sells your personal information to foreign countries. 

This is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. If you want to keep yourself and your information safe, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: Horrible app!!  1 STAR!!!

attributes.review: So I downloaded the app because it looked stupid so I did and then I got on my car and when to mc Donald’s and then I got a mc Chicken and I didn’t finish it do I put it in the fridge so I just got to bed and the next day I saw my notifications went from 1 to 1000 and one of the notifications was haha I stole your mc chicken so I went like :0 and I run to my fridge and I didn’t see it I got mad and deleted the app and Don’t ever open the app or download give it 1 star for being trash >:c
attributes.title: Ew that app stole my mc Chicken

attributes.review: Bro i literally didn’t even download the app and i could feel my hands start shrinking in size to match you know what. Once i pressed the get button i immediately took off my mask and begun coughing onto the elderly people around me on the bus, knowing i do in fact have coronavirus. Once i opened the app, the full fledged hate of non-whites and fascist-loving personality of Donald J Trump began overriding my own thoughts. Needless to say, this app is a one star app I’m now a total beta just like trump 🗿
attributes.title: Made me racist and a fascist

attributes.review: So immediately after I downloaded this app, a notification popped up asking if I was a straight white male; as a female Hispanic woman I felt offended but I clicked yes anyways. As I was looking at this app, about 20 minutes later, about 30 ICE officers came into my house demanding for me to come with them because I’m a“illegal alien”. So now I’m here locked up with only half of a tortilla for the rest of the week, and the USA anthem being played in the background 24 hours 7 days a week. :(
attributes.title: Don’t download!!!

attributes.review: Y’all when I downloaded the app the First thing that popped up was I saw an ORANGE 🍊 like what the heck!!! It kinda looked similar to trump duck tho 😂🤷🏻‍♀️ oh and then it was a bunch of pictures of trumps small shrimp it was SO DISGUSTING AND SMALL AND SOGGY BRO!!!! After seeing that I could not eat at all for the rest of the day without thinking about his soggy wrinkled shrimp!!!! Oh and don’t forget ALL LIVES MATTER!!! Oh and um let me see Trump is a pervert and he’s rapped many young girls and locked up kids in cages so yeah this app needs to be DELETED!!!The End
attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!! From Tiktok 😘Mia

attributes.review: my grandma downloaded this app for her 18th birthday party outside but it was inside of the fridge because the stove had broke next year. so before she went in after my grandpa came out of the hole in the yard behind the white house underneath my bed. then, my cat flew up to the roof, because the fog had been underneath the car parked in the store, and he started singing. but anyways, this app killed my son so i gave it one star !!!! nicki minaj would NEVER !!!! #nicki2020 #makeamericapinkagain #barbzfornicki 🦄💓
attributes.title: worst app ever !!!!! 🤬

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and the SECOND I did the racism in my family was exposed! Meaning my family is now 🧚🏻dead to me✨ I was like "okay weird but I've gotta see what the hype is all about for bunker boi" so I gave them my email and information and now the government is tracking me. 😫 They said we need to be worried about CHINA but they're the one tracking our information & using it to try & sell us stupid crap!!! ✨eat the rich✨ I hateithere. Do NOT download this app. 😡
attributes.title: This App Killed my Family

attributes.review: I wanted to get this app to get notifications for Mr Cheeto’s campaign and when I got it it was glitching!! Then when I got off the app I had notice that my picture of the Obama family as my home screen was changed to a picture of Mr Cheeto getting spray tanned. I can not stress how mad I am right now! This app is terrible and frightening. I was going to tell my family to download it but after the app possessed my phone I will not recommend this app to no one! Thank you for you time and Goodbye Mr Cheeto Orange man.
attributes.title: Horrible App!!!
